package.name: Net_Cyrus
package.summary: provides an API for the administration of Cyrus IMAP servers.
package.description: API for the administration of Cyrus IMAP servers. It can be used to create,delete and modify users and it's properties (Quota and ACL)

release.notes: * Fixed bug #1705 (yes, I copy an paste documentation from createUser!) * Fixed bug #1710 (missed return)

* _getUserName() -> getUserName became a public method on demand * Fixed bug #1279 * Fixed a typo in line #85 the connect method is public not private * Fixed a bug returning " , " when the password is not correct
